SELECT ii.item_id, ii.item_name, iv.item_sKU, ib.item_brand_name, ii.item_price, ii.sales, ii.refund_num, ii.item_price*ii.sales AS salesMoney FROM item_info ii LEFT JOIN item_value iv ON ii.item_id=iv.item_id LEFT JOIN item_brand ib ON ii.item_brand_id=ib.item_brand_id LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON iv.item_sKU=oi.itm_SKU
ii.item_name LIKE '%${itemName}%'
AND ii.item_id LIKE '%${itemId}%'
AND iv.item_sKU LIKE '%${itemSKU}%'
AND ib.item_brand_name LIKE '%${itemBrandName}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(oi.created,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(oi.created,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY iv.item_sKU
ORDER BY ii.created DESC
ORDER BY ii.sales DESC
ORDER BY ii.refund_num DESC
ORDER BY salesMoney DESC
LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

ii.item_name LIKE '%${itemName}%'
